desc: Home Hardware is dealer owned and is the largest organisation of its kind in the UK, for independent hardware stores. It has over 400 members including independent hardware retailers, housewares shops, cook shops, ironmongers and garden centres. Home Hardware is about 'people helping people'.

layout.text:
With over 20,000 products from 300 leading brands Home Hardware has everything you need for your Home and Garden. 
Buy online for home delivery or collect from your local store.
